data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Zadarska be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zadarska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 708 believers in Zadarska, Croatia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary: On average, 25 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Zadarska, Croatia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, guide the church in Zadarska, Croatia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 12,915 who are far from you in Zadarska, Croatia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Croatian-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Please, teach the 708 believers in Zadarska, Croatia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 708 believers in the state of Zadarska.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 708 believers in the state of Zadarska into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

location.name: Zadarska
location.cities_list: Zadar, Biograd na Moru, Bibinje, Preko, Pag
location.cities_list_w_pop: Zadar (71,258), Biograd na Moru (5,285), Bibinje (3,942), Preko (3,871), Pag (2,714)
